data.question: What is the chemical stability of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 in KOH solution?
data.answer: Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 remains highly stable in KOH solution, retaining its skeleton structure.

data.question: How does the conductivity of Co-bpa compare to Co-bpy?
data.answer: The conductivity of Co-bpa is over 5 orders of magnitude higher than Co-bpy.

data.question: What effect does Ni2+ doping have on the conductivity of MOFs?
data.answer: Ni2+ doping significantly improves the conductivity of MOFs.

data.question: Is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 higher than that of Co-bpy?
data.answer: Yes, the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 is much higher than that of Co-bpy.

data.question: What is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 at 1 A g@1?
Does the introduction of Ni2+ cause disruption to the original crystalline structure of MOFs?
data.answer: No, the introduction of Ni2+ causes no disruption to the original crystalline structure of MOFs.

data.question: What is the energy density of the ASC device at a power density of 500 W kg@1?
Can the ASC device power electronic devices after being charged?
data.answer: Yes, the ASC device can power various electronic devices after being charged.

data.question: What is the capacitance retention of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 after 10,000 cycles?
Does the nanoscale size of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 contribute to its enhanced electrochemical performance?
data.answer: Yes, the nanoscale size of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 contributes to its enhanced electrochemical performance.

data.question: Is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 among the top three of reported MOF-based electrodes?
data.answer: Yes, the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 ranks top three among reported MOF-based electrodes.

data.question: What is the effect of N-rGO loading on the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: N-rGO loading increases the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200.

data.question: Does Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO show improved electrochemical performance compared to Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: Yes, Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO shows improved electrochemical performance compared to Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200.

data.question: What is the role of hydrophobic polymethyl groups in the stability of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: Hydrophobic polymethyl groups create a local hydrophobic environment to reduce the attack of water on the active centers, enhancing stability.

data.question: Does the ASC device using Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 as the positive electrode have a potential voltage window of 0â€“1.5 V?
data.answer: No, the maximum working potential of the ASC device is determined to be 1.4 V.

data.question: What is the effect of the nano size modification on the electrochemical performance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: Nano size modification enhances the electrochemical performance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 by reducing equivalent serial resistance and increasing active surface area.

data.question: Is the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO higher than Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200?
data.answer: Yes, the specific capacitance of Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO is higher than Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200.

data.question: What is the role of N-rGO in the nanocomposite Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200@N-rGO?
data.answer: N-rGO provides lower resistance electronic pathways, enhances mechanical/chemical stability, and increases active sites or areas for ion adsorption/desorption.

data.question: Does the introduction of bimetallic nodes with a unique metal proportion contribute to the conductivity of MOFs?
data.answer: Yes, the introduction of bimetallic nodes with a unique metal proportion contributes to the improved conductivity of MOFs.

data.question: Can the ASC device using Co0.24Ni0.76-bpa-200 as the positive electrode power a mini light-emitting diode traffic light?
data.answer: Yes, the ASC device can robustly light up a mini light-emitting diode traffic light after being charged.
